snippet.title: Collaborations on the starting blocks Les collaborations dans les starting blocks
snippet.description: Collaborations on the starting blocks Les collaborations dans les starting blocks / The detectors are finished, the caverns are closed, and the experiments are taking their first data (courtesy of the cosmos). Together, the six experiments of the LHC represent a culmination of an immense international journey, one that has depended on technology and innovation that could barely have been imagined when the experiments were first proposed, some as long ago as 1992 [...] BUL-NA-2008-122; 37/2008; 38/2008.- 2008 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 37/2008 38/2008 Fulltext: JPG;
